channel.title: CVE Feed for MagniGenie -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MagniGenie -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35719|2024-06-08T13:16:03.168Z -- magnigenie -- restropress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MagniGenie RestroPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects RestroPress: from n/a through 3.1.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32449|2024-04-15T07:53:29.694Z -- magnigenie -- restropress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in MagniGenie RestroPress.This issue affects RestroPress: from n/a through 3.1.2.
